entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Light snow beginning late this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 27 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 27 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023
